step: Find a Worker or Post a Job
details:
Search for the specific type of worker you need (e.g., "carpenter"). 
Alternatively, post a job by describing the task you want to be done.
Select the worker who is closest to the job location and best suited for the task.
Sit back and relax as the worker completes the job according to your requirements.
Take a look at the finished job and ensure it meets your expectations.

step: Submit a Review and Earn Points
details: Share your feedback by submitting a review about the completed task.
